Typealiases.html#/s:11GeoTrackKit20GeoTr.name: GeoTrackAuthCallback
Typealiases.html#/s:11GeoTrackKit20GeoTr.abstract: This is a callback to let you know that the authorization state has been reached

Protocols/GeoTrackLogAppender.html#/s:vP.name: logLevel
Protocols/GeoTrackLogAppender.html#/s:vP.abstract: The Log output level for this appender

Protocols/GeoTrackLogAppender.html#/s:FP.name: logged(event:)
Protocols/GeoTrackLogAppender.html#/s:FP.abstract: Notifies the appender that an event has occurred.

Protocols/ZoomDefining.html#/s:FP11GeoTr.name: zoomRegion(for:)
Protocols/ZoomDefining.html#/s:FP11GeoTr.abstract: Provides a zoom region for the provided points

Protocols/GeoTrackService.html.name: GeoTrackService
Protocols/GeoTrackService.html.abstract: This is the protocol for the GeoTrackService. It will handle starting and stopping tracking.

Protocols/ZoomDefining.html.name: ZoomDefining
Protocols/ZoomDefining.html.abstract: A protocol that tells us the implementer can define the size of the zoom area.

Protocols/GeoTrackLogAppender.html.name: GeoTrackLogAppender
Protocols/GeoTrackLogAppender.html.abstract: Protocol that is used to define an appender

Extensions/Date.html#/s:ZFE11GeoTrackKit.name: from(msse:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:ZFE11GeoTrackKit.abstract: Gets you a Date from the provided MSSE (Milliseconds Since the Epoch)

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE11GeoTrackKitV.name: msse
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE11GeoTrackKitV.abstract: Gives you the MSSE (Milliseconds Since the Epoch) representation of this date

Extensions/CLLocation.html#/s:ZFE11GeoTr.name: from(map:)
Extensions/CLLocation.html#/s:ZFE11GeoTr.abstract: Attempts to re-constitute a CLLocation object from a map. Deserialization.

Extensions/CLLocation.html#/s:vE11GeoTra.name: map
Extensions/CLLocation.html#/s:vE11GeoTra.abstract: Converts this CLLocation object to a Map (for serialization). Please note: we use MSSE (Milliseconds Since the Epoch) format for the date.

Extensions/Notification/GeoTrackKit.html.name: didResumeLocationUpdates
Extensions/Notification/GeoTrackKit.html.abstract: Notification that location updates have been resumed

Extensions/Notification/GeoTrackKit.html.name: didFailWithError
Extensions/Notification/GeoTrackKit.html.abstract: Notification that there was a failure tracking location updates

Extensions/Notification/GeoTrackKit.html.name: didFinishDeferredUpdatesWithError
Extensions/Notification/GeoTrackKit.html.abstract: Notification that deferred updates have failed with an error

Extensions/Notification/GeoMapping.html#.name: legVisibilityChanged
Extensions/Notification/GeoMapping.html#.abstract: Tells you that a leg’s visibility has been toggle on or off and therefore the map should be updated

Extensions/Notification/GeoMapping.html.name: GeoMapping
Extensions/Notification/GeoMapping.html.abstract: A notification that tells us that a visibility of one or more legs has been toggled on the map.

Enums/GeoTrackState.html.name: GeoTrackState
Enums/GeoTrackState.html.abstract: The states we keep track of for Geo Tracking

Classes/GeoTrackEventLog.html#/s:vC11Geo.name: mostRecentEvent
Classes/GeoTrackEventLog.html#/s:vC11Geo.abstract: Gets you the most recent event in the event log

Classes/GeoTrackEventLog.html#/s:FC11Geo.name: add(appender:)
Classes/GeoTrackEventLog.html#/s:FC11Geo.abstract: Adds an appender to the list of appenders

Classes/GeoTrackEventLog.html#/s:FC11Geo.name: remove(appender:)
Classes/GeoTrackEventLog.html#/s:FC11Geo.abstract: Removes an appender from the appender list.

Classes/GeoTrackEventLog.html#/s:FC11Geo.name: removeAllAppenders()
Classes/GeoTrackEventLog.html#/s:FC11Geo.abstract: Removes all of the appenders that we have loaded

Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:vC11GeoTrack.name: unknownColor
Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:vC11GeoTrack.abstract: The color to use when rendering a leg of unknown direction (could be flat, or we just don’t have enough altitude change to tell if it’s an ascent or descent)

Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:vC11GeoTrack.name: ascentColor
Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:vC11GeoTrack.abstract: The color to use when rendering an ascent

Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:vC11GeoTrack.name: descentColor
Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:vC11GeoTrack.abstract: The color to use when rendering a descent

Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:vC11GeoTrack.name: zoomDelegate
Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:vC11GeoTrack.abstract: The Zoom Delegate: which tells us if / where to zoom to

Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:vC11GeoTrack.name: model
Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:vC11GeoTrack.abstract: The UI Model for the track. When you set it, we render it!

Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:FC11GeoTrack.name: renderTrack()
Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:FC11GeoTrack.abstract: This will render your track on the map (based on what you’ve toggled as visible in the model)

Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:FC11GeoTrack.name: mapView(_:rendererFor:)
Classes/GeoTrackMap.html#/s:FC11GeoTrack.abstract: Delegate function that provides the MKOverlayRenderer for the Leg Overlays

Classes/GeoTrackEvent/Level.html#/s:vOC1.name: name
Classes/GeoTrackEvent/Level.html#/s:vOC1.abstract: The human readable name for this log level

Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:vC11GeoTra.name: level
Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:vC11GeoTra.abstract: The log level for this event (defaults to Info)

Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:FC11GeoTra.name: init(level:message:)
Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:FC11GeoTra.abstract: Initializes the GeoTrackEvent with a log level, message and the current Date.

Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:FC11GeoTra.name: init(level:date:message:)
Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:FC11GeoTra.abstract: Initializes the GeoTrackEvent iwth a log level, message and specific date.

Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTr.name: trace(message:)
Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTr.abstract: Log at the tracing level (potentially very chatty).

Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTr.name: debug(message:)
Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTr.abstract: Log at the debug level (could be quite chatty).

Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTr.name: info(message:)
Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTr.abstract: Log at the info level (should not be very chatty)

Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTr.name: warn(message:)
Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTr.abstract: Log at the warn level (should not happen very often)

Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTr.name: error(message:)
Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTr.abstract: Log at the error level (this should not happen very often at all)

Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html#/s:ZvC11Ge.name: altitudeSensitivity
Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html#/s:ZvC11Ge.abstract: The sensitivity of the track detection (in meters). If you set this too high, it won’t detect runs properly, if you set it too low, it will detect more runs than you actually have done

Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html#/s:vC11Geo.name: track
Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html#/s:vC11Geo.abstract: The track that we’re calculating the statistics from

Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html#/s:vC11Geo.name: legs
Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html#/s:vC11Geo.abstract: The [mutable] legs of the track (ascents and descents)

Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html#/s:FC11Geo.name: init(track:)
Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html#/s:FC11Geo.abstract: Initializes this Track Analyzer with a track. You must still call calculate() to generate the statistics. This isn’t done on construction for performance reasons.

Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html#/s:FC11Geo.name: calculate()
Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html#/s:FC11Geo.abstract: Calculates the statistics from the data set. It will populate the legs and the stats.

Classes/DefaultMapZoom.html#/s:FC11GeoTr.name: zoomRegion(for:)
Classes/DefaultMapZoom.html#/s:FC11GeoTr.abstract: Provides a zoom region for the provided points

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit.name: events
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: The Track Events that have occured that are related to this track

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit.name: name
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: The track name (defaults to an empty string)

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.name: init(name:description:)
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: Initializer that sets the name and description for the track

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.name: init(json:)
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: Initializer that will deserialize the provided json into CLLocation objects. This is essentially the deserializer

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.name: add(locations:)
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: Adds an array of locations to the track

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.name: log(withPoints:)
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: Gets you the event log, and will include the points if you want them.

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.name: startTracking(message:)
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: Adds a Start Tracking event to the track’s event log.

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.name: pauseTracking(message:)
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: Adds a Pause Tracking event to the track’s event log.

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.name: stopTracking(message:)
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: Adds a Stop Tracking event to the track’s event log.

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.name: error(message:)
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: Adds a custom error message to the track’s event log.

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.name: error(error:)
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: Adds an error to the track’s event log

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit.name: map
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit.abstract: Converts this Grack to a Map so you can serialize it

Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTrackKi.name: fromMap(map:)
Classes/GeoTrack.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTrackKi.abstract: Deserializes this track from a Map, or if there’s a problem, it will return you nil.

Classes/GeoTrackConsoleAppender.html#/s:.name: uniqueId
Classes/GeoTrackConsoleAppender.html#/s:.abstract: The Unique ID of the appender (for comparison)

Classes/GeoTrackConsoleAppender.html#/s:.name: logged(event:)
Classes/GeoTrackConsoleAppender.html#/s:.abstract: Handles the logging of an event (prints it to the console in this case).

Classes/Leg.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit3Leg8.name: altitude
Classes/Leg.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit3Leg8.abstract: The Altitude at the referred to point

Classes/Leg.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit3Leg1.name: altitudeChange
Classes/Leg.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit3Leg1.abstract: The calculated change in altitude between the start and end point

Classes/Leg.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit3Legc.name: init(index:point:direction:endIndex:endPoint:)
Classes/Leg.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackKit3Legc.abstract: Initializes the Leg with an index, point, direction, endIndex and endPoint

Classes/Leg.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTrackKit3Leg.abstract: Tells us if two legs are the same. They are the same if their indices, altitude and direction are the same.

Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.name: runs
Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.abstract: The number of ski runs (aka the number of times descended)

Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.name: verticalAscent
Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.abstract: The total vertical ascent for the entire track

Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.name: verticalDescent
Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.abstract: The total vertical descent for the entire track

Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.name: ascentDistance
Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.abstract: The total distance covered during ascents for this track

Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.name: descentDistance
Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.abstract: The total distance covered during descents for this track

Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.name: totalDistance
Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKi.abstract: The total distance covered for this track

Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTrackK.name: summarize(from:)
Classes/TrackStat.html#/s:ZFC11GeoTrackK.abstract: Using the provided array of Legs, this function will compute the track summary stats and provide you with a a summary TrackStat for the entire track.

Classes/Stat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit4Sta.name: maximumSpeed
Classes/Stat.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackKit4Sta.abstract: The maximum recorded speed (in meters per second)

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent/EventType..name: other
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent/EventType..abstract: Some other type of event has occurred

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent/EventType..name: string
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent/EventType..abstract: A human readable string for the event

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:vC.name: string
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:vC.abstract: Converts this event to a human readable string

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.name: startedTracking(message:)
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.abstract: Creates you a GeoTrackLocationEvent of type startedTrack

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.name: pausedTracking(message:)
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.abstract: Creates you a GeoTrackLocationEvent of type pausedTrack

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.name: stoppedTracking(message:)
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.abstract: Creates you a GeoTrackLocationEvent of type stoppedTrack

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.name: error(error:at:timestamp:)
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.abstract: Creates you a GeoTrackLocationEvent of type error

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.name: error(error:at:timestamp:)
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.abstract: Creates you a GeoTrackLocationEvent of type error

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.name: error(message:at:timestamp:)
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.abstract: Creates you a GeoTrackLocationEvent of type error

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.name: custom(message:at:timestamp:)
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.abstract: Creates you a custom GeoTrackLocationEvent. You should make sure to provide either an index, a date, or both for context.

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.name: from(map:)
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:ZF.abstract: Deserializes the provided map into a GeoTrackLocationEvent.

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:vC.name: map
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html#/s:vC.abstract: Serializes this GeoTrackLocationEvent into a map for serialization purposes.

Classes/GeoTrackManager.html#/s:vC11GeoT.name: lastPoint
Classes/GeoTrackManager.html#/s:vC11GeoT.abstract: The last Geo Point to be tracked

Classes/GeoTrackManager.html#/s:vC11GeoT.name: applicationName
Classes/GeoTrackManager.html#/s:vC11GeoT.abstract: The application name - do we really need this?

Classes/GeoTrackManager.html#/s:vC11GeoT.name: isAwaitingFix
Classes/GeoTrackManager.html#/s:vC11GeoT.abstract: Are we currently getting a location fix?

Classes/GeoTrackManager.html#/s:FC11GeoT.name: startTracking()
Classes/GeoTrackManager.html#/s:FC11GeoT.abstract: Attempts to start tracking (if we’re not already).

Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackK.name: analyzer
Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackK.abstract: The Track analyzer (provides stats about the track)

Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackK.name: init(with:)
Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackK.abstract: Initializes the UI Model with the provided track. It then creates the analyzer and calculates the stats for it.

Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackK.name: isVisible(at:)
Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackK.abstract: Tells you if the leg at the specified index is visible or not

Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackK.name: set(visibility:for:)
Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:FC11GeoTrackK.abstract: Toggles the visibility and sends out a notification

Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackK.name: legs
Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackK.abstract: The current set of legs that are visible on the map

Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackK.name: allLegs
Classes/UIGeoTrack.html#/s:vC11GeoTrackK.abstract: The entire set of legs (including those that are hidden)

Classes/UIGeoTrack.html.name: UIGeoTrack
Classes/UIGeoTrack.html.abstract: A UI Model for a track. It keeps track of a Track (GeoTrack), a Track Analyzer (GeoTrackAnalyzer) and a collection of Legs (ascents, descents) that are currently visible

Classes/GeoTrackManager.html.name: GeoTrackManager
Classes/GeoTrackManager.html.abstract: This class is responsible for managing (and brokering) everything related to tracking for you.

Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html.name: GeoTrackLocationEvent
Classes/GeoTrackLocationEvent.html.abstract: This class is responsible for keeping track of different types of track events. For example when the user starts tracking, stops tracking, pauses tracking, and your own custom event types.

Classes/Stat.html.name: Stat
Classes/Stat.html.abstract: This class keeps track of statistics for a Leg (ascent or descent) of a track.

Classes/TrackStat.html.name: TrackStat
Classes/TrackStat.html.abstract: This class keeps track of statistics for an entire Geo Track. It summarizes the stats of all of the legs that comprise it and it keeps trak of the number of runs.

Classes/GeoTrack.html.name: GeoTrack
Classes/GeoTrack.html.abstract: Data structure to keep track of points for a track

Classes/DefaultMapZoom.html.name: DefaultMapZoom
Classes/DefaultMapZoom.html.abstract: This is an implementation of the default map zooming. It basically just states that you should always zoom to fit the points (whenever a redraw on the map is requested) and it calculates a zoom region that has a very tiny amount of padding around the points

Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html.name: GeoTrackAnalyzer
Classes/GeoTrackAnalyzer.html.abstract: This class is used to generate statistics about your track. Please note, this is a trivial implementation for ascent / descent detection. This implementation does not (currently) do any sort of noise reduction or utilize the vertical accuracy of the data to remove potentially erronious points. It might make sense (down the roade) to abstract a protocol from this and have multiple implementations to choose from that perform noise reduction or some sort of statistical smoothing to clean up the data for accuracy.

Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html.name: GeoTrackEvent
Classes/GeoTrackEvent.html.abstract: This class is used to track a GeoTrackEvent (for logging purposes).

Classes/GeoTrackMap.html.name: GeoTrackMap
Classes/GeoTrackMap.html.abstract: This class provides you an easy way to visualize your track on a map. You can configure the unknown, ascent and descent colors. They have sensible defaults. Using the UIGeoTrack model, you can set which legs of your track are visible and we’ll render them accordingly. Keep in mind, performance of this control may degrade if your tracks have too many points.

Classes.html.abstract: The following classes are available globally.

Enums.html.abstract: The following enums are available globally.

Extensions.html.abstract: The following extensions are available globally.

Protocols.html.abstract: The following protocols are available globally.

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following typealiases are available globally.
